error_already_sent_message_description: We have already sent SMS to this number. Try sending again in 1 minute.
error_already_registred_description:
This number is already registered in the system.
Try to log in to your account or recover your password.
warning_already_sent_message_go_back: We have already sent SMS to this number, do you really want to return?
warning_resend_again: Do you really want to send SMS again?
error_wrong_code_description:
The code is entered incorrectly or is no longer relevant.
Please try to enter it again, or send the request again
error_login_user_not_found_description:
We did not find a user with this number.
Try to register to continue
error_login_password_not_matched_descrip: You entered the wrong password, try to remember it, or restore it.
lgout_warning_tite: Are you sure you want to log out?
lgout_warning_description:
Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
Your account data will not be lost.
unsaved_changes:
You have unsaved changes.
Do you really want to go back?
global_error_description: It seems that something happened to the server, we are already working on it. Try again a little later
